thread.title: Rui Sousa
thread.title_full: Americor Financial Services reviewed by Rui Sousa

author: Rui Sousa
title: Rui Sousa
text: My expectations were that there would be no real activity on my unsecured debt for close to 6 to 9 months. In less than 4 months the secure a settlement of 45% of the debt on one of my major credit cards. Both my wife and I were blown away. We took a shot and so far it has paid off
